We designed usable security to be adopted by organizations of all shapes and sizes, particularly those falling below the “security poverty line”. Over 12 years, Duo scaled from zero to 30,000+ customers and $500m+ ARR, ranging from the least-sophisticated SMBs to the world’s largest and fastest-growing enterprises. Duo achieved market leadership in MFA and Zero Trust, through innovations like Duo Push, industry-wide standards (U2F, WebAuthn), and 70+ patents.

Duo had a uniquely-broad GTM driven by PLG: Half of the business (SMB, mid-market) was delivered through a low-touch, high-velocity inbound motion, while the other half (enterprise, SLED, fed) was a more typical field program. We achieved best-in-class SaaS metrics with a T3D2 (1m -> 3m -> 10m -> 31m -> 73m -> 127m ARR), 90%+ renewal rate, 120%+ NDR, and 85%+ GM. The most important measure of our success was our customers’ success, with fanactical customer love and a 70+ NPS, unheard of in cybersecurity.

In 2018, we joined forces with Cisco in a $2.4B acquisition, a record-setting LTM multiple for an all-cash transaction in software at the time. While we raised $120m from an exceptional group of investors, we exited with over $80m in cash, a testament to the efficiency of the business, spending less than $40m to achieve $170m ARR. Within Cisco, Duo became the fastest growing at-scale SaaS business, growing to over $500m ARR in 3 years, and helped drive Cisco's broader SaaS transformation.

Our team of 1000+ Duonauts drove our success. The team lived our cultural values: engineering the business, learning together, and being kinder than necessary. It has been amazing to see our past Duo colleagues move on to the next step in their respective careers and bring the best of their Duo experiences to their new organizations. As our saying went, we wanted Duo to be a great place to be, and a great place to be from.
